bibl.title: Photograph of a map of Columbia Barracks with annotations by [Philip Showalter Hench] and Albert E. Truby, Havana, Cuba, 1901

div1.head: Photograph of a map of Columbia Barracks with annotations by [Philip Showalter Hench] and Albert E. Truby, Havana, Cuba, 1901
div1.p:
This map (a tattered blue print) is in
the office of the Chief Engineer.
Ciudad Militar, Havana, Cuba
This photo shows only the left 1/3 of the
map.

In the lower right hand corner of the
map (not shown here) it says
“After original by
Willis E Ayres, Engineer & Drfts,
W.B. Ditmars, Del.,
Apr 29, 1901.

This is an 1899 map checked by
a survey of March 1901

I am anxious to get a blue print
of this whole map.

Shows artillery Barracks & Stables
Infantry ”
Officers ”

This shows the additions
to 1901 including Stark's
house. Notice the cemetery. The
square lot is not as large
as the one in the original 1899
map, and is positively our cemetery
AET
